sentence: Looking at options trading activity among components of the Russell 3000 index, there is noteworthy activity today in Immersion Corp (Symbol: IMMR), where a total volume of 2,270 contracts has been traded thus far today, a contract volume which is representative of approximately 227,000 underlying shares (given that every 1 contract represents 100 underlying shares).
That number works out to 61.9% of IMMR's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 366,810 shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $10 strike put option expiring August 16, 2019 , with 2,004 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 200,400 underlying shares of IMMR.

Below is a chart showing IMMR's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $10 strike highlighted in orange:

Salesforce.com Inc (Symbol: CRM) saw options trading volume of 37,921 contracts, representing approximately 3.8 million underlying shares or approximately 57.7% of CRM's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 6.6 million shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $152.50 strike put option expiring March 08, 2019 , with 2,464 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 246,400 underlying shares of CRM.

Below is a chart showing CRM's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $152.50 strike highlighted in orange:

And Dick's Sporting Goods, Inc (Symbol: DKS) options are showing a volume of 10,803 contracts thus far today.
That number of contracts represents approximately 1.1 million underlying shares, working out to a sizeable 57.2% of DKS's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 1.9 million shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $43 strike call option expiring March 15, 2019 , with 3,009 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 300,900 underlying shares of DKS.

Below is a chart showing DKS's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $43 strike highlighted in orange:
